title: Mike Tyson, $500 Wedding, Shirley's Candles, Keke Palmer and more.
itunes:title: Mike Tyson, $500 Wedding, Shirley's Candles, Keke Palmer and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Somebody got a lot of AKA's and matter of fact, he'll tell you about them right here.  Stealing will not be condoned in and @ The Jackpot Joint of Jeru$alem, however, props were given tho!  The Chief Love Officer is here to specifically help Black men!  "Everybody got a plan until they get punched in the mouth."  Tommy talks about his son's interests.  Is $500 too cheap for a wedding or nah?  The fellas talk about their dating days and Uncle Steve talks about his three year set up.  From her heart to yours, get you one of Shirley's candles just in time for Mother's Day.  Would You Rather asks a $500 million question about cheating.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve keeps it 100.  "It's never too late to start."  Remember KFC?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
